The team looked to Montreal for inspiration .
The Canadian city is famous for its distinct bagels , which are smaller and sweeter than those you find in the Big Apple .

RelatedSentence: Montreal bagels are more , I want to say , on the spectrum of bread , they 're more on the pretzel side as opposed to the bread side .
